tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP need) (NP (DT a) (ADJP (JJR more) (JJ exciting)) (NN life))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [need/VBP nsubj>I/PRP dobj>[life/NN det>a/DT amod>[exciting/JJ dep>more/JJR]] punct>./.]

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP hate) (S (VP (VBG sitting) (PP (IN in) (NP (NP (PRP$ my) (NN house)) (ADVP (RB alone))) (ADVP (RB !!))))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [hate/VBP nsubj>I/PRP xcomp>[sitting/VBG nmod:in>[house/NN case>in/IN nmod:poss>my/PRP$ advmod>alone/RB advmod>!!/RB]]]
